Title: Explore GenAI for customer support with Elastic Support Assistant | ODFP939
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Just as generative AI has moved faster than anyone could have expected, Elastic has moved fast and developed assistants aimed at solving different use cases for our customers. The Support Assistant is a generative AI powered chat experience designed to answer a range of questions across all Elastic products. Learn how a RAG architecture powered by Elasticsearch and Microsoft Azure OpenAI delivered impressive results for our users and provided a platform for future generative AI solutions.

𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗮𝗸𝗲𝗿𝘀: \* Chris Blaisure 𝗦𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗜𝗻𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: This is one of many sessions from the Microsoft Ignite 2024 event. View even more sessions on-demand and learn about Microsoft Ignite at https://ignite.microsoft.com
